Name: Anno 1800
Beschreibung: Lead the Industrial Revolution! Welcome to the beginning of the industrial age. Choose your path and change your world with it. Are you a visionary or an exploiter? A conqueror or a liberator? You alone decide how you go down in history.

Name: theHunter Call of the Wild
Beschreibung: Experience an unrivaled atmospheric hunting game set in a realistic and stunning open world. Play the single player campaign or experience the ultimate hunting experience with your friends in multiplayer.

Name: Overcooked! 2
Beschreibung: Overcooked returns with a brand new second batch of mayhem cooking action! Return to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold on to your aprons... It's (again) time to save the world!

Name: War Thunder
Beschreibung: War Thunder is a free-to-play cross-platform MMO combat game dedicated to the military vehicles of WWII and Korean War. Take part in air, land and sea battles of epic proportions with players from all over the world.

Name: Cyberpunk 2077
Beschreibung: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action-adventure RPG set in Night City - a dangerous metropolis whose denizens are obsessed with power, glamor and body modification.
